LanguageData.VFEE_PipeOrgans.label: трубний орган
LanguageData.VFEE_PipeOrgans.description: Craft the pipe organs, an incredibly advanced and intricate stationary musical instrument.
LanguageData.VFEE_NobleDecorations.label: благородні прикраси
LanguageData.VFEE_NobleDecorations.description: Build noble decorations like royal rugs, mirrors, grand chairs, imperial slabs, candelabras, and more.
LanguageData.VFEE_StellicThrone.label: трон стелларха
LanguageData.VFEE_StellicThrone.description: Construct the most grand, most beautiful stellic throne for your high ranking nobility.
LanguageData.VFEE_JanissaryGear.label: спорядження яничар
LanguageData.VFEE_JanissaryGear.description: Craft janissary armor, light powered armor that’s commonly used by imperial recon troops. Note that these also require advanced components.
